Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Y...<sp:5:0:0>you...<sp:5:1:0> What are you doing in a place
like this?!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>No,<sp:5:0:0> no, it doesn't matter.<sp:5:1:0> Could you just
help me?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>You're my last hope.<sp:5:1:0> Please, do
something, <sp:5:0:0>I'm begging you...
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>I set off a trap in the ruins, and now I'm
stuck.<sp:5:1:0> Oh,<sp:5:0:0> what a mess...
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Thank you!<sp:5:1:0> I knew you'd rescue me!


<sp:3:0:2:0101>I don't have much, but... <sp:5:1:0>Please.<sp:5:0:0>
Take this.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Can you see a <clr:0000>switch<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0> If you press that,
you should be able to get me out of this.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>That is what lured me into the trap.
I don't even want to look at it anymore.<sp:5:0:0>
Do whatever you want with it.
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Wait!<sp:5:1:0> I don't have time to chat!


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I have urgent business at the tower,<sp:5:0:0> so I
have to go.<sp:5:1:0> Thanks again!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hello there, mister! <sp:5:1:0>Thanks again for
saving me.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I was only in the area in the first place to
do maintenance on the tower.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>The terminal wasn't making anything
happen due to the humidity, <sp:5:0:0>but I fixed
it in a jiffy.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's a <clr:0000>cave entrance <clr:ffff>over there.<sp:5:1:0>
I got in that way.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Unfortunately,<sp:5:1:0> getting stuck caused all
kinds of delays.<sp:5:0:0> I need to hurry to
the next Skyview Tower.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I probably caused trouble for my friends
at the construction company, so I'm going
to get moving as soon as I calm down.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm begging you, mister!<sp:5:1:0> I'll just be
waiting here, trusting you...
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for pressing the switch! I can
finally find my way out of here.

I got myself caught in that trap pretty
badly and had no way to escape.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is all I've got right now, but I want
you to have it.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Unconscious_00>I...<sp:5:0:0> Wait, really? <sp:5:1:0>If...if you leave me here,<sp:5:0:0>
I don't know what will happen to me...
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I'm begging you.<sp:5:1:0> Could you <sp:5:0:0>please<sp:5:0:0>
help me?
